= JSON Output  =

== Model for Date == 

This is the JSON generated by Djangos json-serializer.

Pro: this will automaticly change if the model is changed.

Con: Could be stronger de-normalized. Adress and Location information. Shouldn't need an exta request. 

{{{
[{ "pk": 2, 
    "model": "dates.date", 
    "fields": {"startdate": "2008-04-09", 
               "enddate": "2008-04-09 23:58:59", 
               "description": "description-text", 
               "created": "2008-04-13 21:26:21", 
               "modified": "2008-04-10 00:14:53", 
               "publish": true, 
               "summary": "Summary-String", 
               "allowcomments": true, 
               "location": 1, 
               "starttime": "20:00:00", 
               "owner": null, 
               "organizer": null, 
               "adress": 1, 
               "slug": "summary-string"
              }
}]
}}}
